name: MPMediaPickerControllerDelegate
desc: The protocol you implement so that a media item picker can respond to a user making media item selections.

items.name: func mediaPicker(MPMediaPickerController, didPickMediaItems: MPMediaItemCollection)
items.desc: Called when a user has selected a set of media items.

items.name: func mediaPickerDidCancel(MPMediaPickerController)
items.desc: Called when a user dismisses a media item picker by tapping Cancel.
